function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of COVID-19 spread in open-plan offices and linear desk arrangements","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among co-workers","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and ventilation improvements","Technologies":"Air filtration systems and contactless technologies for office use","People":"Employees working in open-plan offices","Owner":"Employers and building managers"},{"Description":"Risk of contagion in enclosed communal circulation spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in lobbies, corridors, and elevator cabins","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning, air circulation improvements, and capacity limitations","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and touchless access controls","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building owners and property managers"},{"Description":"Impact of stay-at-home orders on mental health and vulnerability","Impact":"Higher psychological stress, interpersonal conflicts, and inequalities","Mitigation":"Mental health support services, community outreach, and social welfare programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote counseling platforms, and mental health apps","People":"People with disabilities, pre-existing health issues, the homeless, and isolated individuals","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare providers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Closure of small neighborhood parks impacting mental health","Impact":"Reduced access to greenspace and social interaction, leading to increased strain on mental health","Mitigation":"Safe outdoor gathering guidelines, virtual community programs, and mental health support","Technologies":"Virtual reality tours, community apps, and outdoor activity trackers","People":"Community members, especially vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local authorities and community organizations"}]}
